poem:
"France Trembles on the Axis of Change"

In the shadow of defeat,
a leader's gesture – Snap!
the echo of surprise fades,
laid bare in newsprint folds.

The pen stirs far-right fears,
in this, the land of liberty,
a vote hangs in the balance –
the edge of tomorrow teeters.

Hear, the battered heart of France!
In whispers and cries,
it finds its voice,
writes its own destiny.
